snippet.title: MINDWAVE Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
MINDWAVE is a cerebral fast-paced microgame experience where the minigames are based on the minds of each of the game's characters, taking the gameplay from something not unlike the WarioWare series.
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2701030/MINDWAVE/
Discord: https://discord.gg/HdhQQWZDMZ
Learn more at https://holohammer.com/mindwave

Pandora finds herself entering Mindscape Tower to take on the opportunity of a lifetime. The first of her opponents is a girl with a vibrant and bubbly personality, and whose mindspace is completely filled with glitter, bright colors, and everything adorable.
They're one-on-one in a game of MINDWAVE: the world's most played cognitive reality game where players connect and experience each others' minds in an unfiltered onslaught of feelings and memories.
Can Pandora handle her first opponent's overwhelming mind and come out on top?

MINDWAVE is in development for PCs.
